answers.answer: Meeeeee, mine started at about 34 wks I'll be 38wks tomorrow and I feel like its the beginning of pregnancy, very nausea and certain foods make me sick to the stomach (the smell) can't wait til its over

Do you have swelling, headaches, see spots sometimes, or have high blood pressures with the nausea? If you have any of these symptoms you should contact your doctor immediately. Nausea late in pregnancy alone does not mean anything, but combined with any of these other symptoms it can mean preeclampsia.

I have that problem to nauseous my doctor said it from digestive system slows down  from being pregnant the bigger we get the more smushed up are stomachs get from baby growing he said eat smaller portion meal so the food digest better hang in there were almost there:)
@heather500 I have swelling and bad headaches, but whn I go to the doctor my bp was fine and no protein in my urine so idk what's going on with me

question: Im 36 weeks an 2 days an lately I been feeling nauseous an food makes me sick I hadn't had this problem until now has any one else have this problem too ?
title: feeling sick at 36 weeks
